law.text:
The Department may deny an application for a facility permit or for a renewal of a facility permit if the Department finds that:
The facility cannot handle or transfer a particular hazardous material without posing an undue risk to the environment; or
The owner of the land or of the facility, or any person making application, has violated:
Any law of the federal government, of this or any other state, or of a local jurisdiction, concerning any hazardous material; or
Any regulation, order, or permit condition of the federal government, of this or any other state, or of any local jurisdiction, concerning any hazardous material.
